member.name: T:FractionLib.Fraction
member.summary: The class Fraction, meant to represent a fraction as in math.

member.name: M:FractionLib.Fraction.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: The two parameter constructor with numerator and denominator

member.name: M:FractionLib.Fraction.Normalize
member.summary: Divides the numerator and denominator with their GCD to get smaller version of the fraction.

member.name: M:FractionLib.Fraction.Value
member.summary: Gives the equivalent decimal value of the fraction.

member.name: M:FractionLib.Fraction.About
member.summary: Method to honor the creator of this library.

member.name: M:FractionLib.Fraction.ToString
member.summary: Gives the string equivalent of the fraction for printing purposes.
member.returns: The string equivalent of the fraction
